title: Bug 102436: Date/time value not stored correctly in report design
description: An invalid date/time string (which does not conform to a universal format or the system default locale format) should have been rejected.
OB: When creating a new BIRT report parameter of type 'DateTime' in the report designer, if an invalid date string is entered in the 'default value' field (e.g., '55/66/9999'), the value is stored incorrectly.
EB: The date value should have been validated by the UI or Model to ensure that only valid date/time strings are accepted.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the BIRT report designer.
2. Create a new report parameter of type 'DateTime'.
3. In the 'default value' field, enter an invalid date string like '55/66/9999'.
